experiences.title: Intern
bullets: Shadowed the Data & AI team, gaining hands-on experience with data pipelines, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes, and building data flows that support AI models.
Developed a solid understanding of enterprise data architecture and how structured data enables AI-driven decision-making.
Gained exposure to training and evaluating machine learning models, including understanding how algorithms improve predictive accuracy.

experiences.title: Laboratory & Technical Support Assistant (Part-Time)
bullets: Monitored laboratory equipment to detect malfunctions and identify defective parts, ensuring smooth operation.
Supported the organization and execution of college events, including hackathons, competitions, and student activities.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data Science

projects.title: Smart Health Predictor
projects.description: Developed a Flask-based web application integrating machine learning models (Random Forest, Logistic Regression, Decision Tree) to predict diabetes, heart disease, and breast cancer risk with up to 95% accuracy.
bullets: Applied data preprocessing techniques (KNN imputation, one-hot encoding, outlier handling) and implemented automated retraining, enabling a scalable, user-friendly health prediction dashboard.

projects.title: AI Interview Platform
projects.description: Built a Full-Stack AI-powered interview simulation platform leveraging LLMs (GPT-4o), Flask-based REST APIs, and a modern React/Vite frontend.
bullets: Integrated AI-driven job-role adaptation with speech-to-text and text-to-speech (Whisper, TTS), supporting Arabic and English interactions.
